original_text: Yes, the Lord will rescue Jacob's descendants. He will pay the cost to let them be free. They will no longer be under the power of people who were stronger than them. Yes, the Lord will rescue Jacob's descendants. He will pay the cost to let them be free. They will no longer be under the power of people who were stronger than them. Yes, the Lord will rescue Jacob's descendants. He will pay the cost to let them be free. They will no longer be under the power of people who were stronger than them. Yes, the Lord will rescue Jacob's descendants.
korean_text: 여호와께서 야곱을 구원하시되 그들보다 강한 자의 손에서 속량하셨으니

sentences.original_text: Yes, the Lord will rescue Jacob's descendants.
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 주께서 야곱의 자손을 구원하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will pay the cost to let them be free.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들이 자유롭게 되도록 대가를 지불하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will no longer be under the power
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 그 권세 아래 있지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: of people who were stronger than them.
Yes, the Lord will rescue Jacob's descendants.
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 주께서 야곱의 자손을 구원하실 것입니다.
